title: 2170, Avenue Lincoln, apt. 1007, Montréal (Ville-Marie)
description: Studio in downtown Montréal. Bright open-concept layout with modern finishes including refrigerator, stove, microwave / convection oven, cooktop and dishwasher. Private balcony. Laundry facilities in the building. All utilities and internet included. Quiet building. Just a 2-minute walk to Atwater metro. Walking distance to shops, cafés, universities and services. Advertised price reflects a promotion with 2 or 3 months free amortized over a 12-month lease.

title: 2170, Avenue Lincoln, apt. 311, Montréal (Ville-Marie)
description: Premium furnished 1 bedroom in downtown Montréal. Fully renovated with brand-new furniture. Bright open-concept layout with modern finishes and a fully equipped kitchen including refrigerator, stove, microwave / convection oven, cooktop and dishwasher. Private balcony. Laundry facilities in the building. All utilities and internet included. Quiet building. Gym. Just a 2-minute walk to Atwater metro. Walking distance to shops, cafés, universities and services. Advertised price reflects a promotion with 2 or 3 months free amortized over a 12-month lease.
